main event: Reports of a flying saucer sighting in Afghanistan on January 24, 1956, with indications that one may have landed.
interesting points: The report mentions multiple sightings of flying saucers in various parts of Afghanistan., One sighting reportedly involved a saucer that landed and was transported to Kabul., Local government authorities were involved in investigating the sightings., The press reported that flying saucers appeared in different shapes and sizes., There was a non-followup on the investigation after initial reports.
